title: Pset_MechanicalFastenerBolt
description: Properties related to bolt-type fasteners. The properties of a whole set with bolt, washers and nut may be provided. Note, it is usually not necessary to transmit these properties in case of standardized bolts. Instead, the standard is referred to.

ThreadDiameter.title: ThreadDiameter
ThreadDiameter.description: Nominal diameter of the thread, if different from the bolt's overall nominal diameter

NutsCount.title: NutsCount
NutsCount.description: Count of nuts to be mounted on one bolt

WashersCount.title: WashersCount
WashersCount.description: Count of washers to be mounted on one bolt

HeadShape.title: HeadShape
HeadShape.description: Shape of the bolt's head, e.g. 'Hexagon', 'Countersunk', 'Cheese'

KeyShape.title: KeyShape
KeyShape.description: If applicable, shape of the head's slot, e.g. 'Slot', 'Allen'
